description: Numbers n such that n^2 is a concatenation of two successive numbers.
links: Donovan Johnson and Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000 (first 53 terms from _Donovan Johnson_)
prog: (PARI) for(n=1, 10^9, t=eval(concat(Str(n),Str(n+1))); if(issquare(t,&s), print1(s,", "))); /* _Antonio Rold√°n_ and _Joerg Arndt_, Dec 31 2012 */
author: _Patrick De Geest_
